title: accountvend0r
author: accountvend0r
content: I am selling a few ranked accounts that I have accumulated over time, I have used these myself in the past to earn from signature campaigns but I am looking to get rid of them. None of the accounts have posts in local boards or negative trust ratings. I am open to using a trusted escrow from https://hackforums.net to do the transaction. Pricing goes as follows:Full Member: 140$ [2 left]Senior Member: 220$ [1 left]Hero Member: 280$ [2 left]Legendary: 350$ [1 left]All of the accounts come with the original email and it can be changed.To purchase, message me on Telegram @slezercc / https://t.me/slezercc
